TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlFormatExtensionPointAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class XmlFormatExtensionPointAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class XmlFormatExtensionPointAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定 XML 命名空間 (Namespace) 和 XML 命名空間前置詞以供服務描述內的服務描述格式延伸使用。

span.span: Specifies the XML namespace and XML namespace prefix to use for a service description format extension within a service description.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服務描述格式延伸能擴充如何產生使用 ASP.NET 建立 XML Web 服務的服務描述。A service description format extension extends how a service description is generated for an XML Web service created using ASP.NET. 具體來說，服務描述格式延伸會將 XML 項目加入至服務描述。Specifically, a service description format extension adds XML elements to the service description. 如需 SOAP 延伸模組的資訊不自動放在服務描述 XML Web 服務，用戶端和伺服器端上執行建置的 SOAP 擴充功能時，這非常有用。This is useful when a SOAP extension is built to run on both the client and server side of an XML Web service, as information about SOAP extensions is not automatically placed in the service description. 如果您加入至服務描述的 SOAP 擴充功能的相關資訊，用戶端可以因此解譯，它必須執行特定的 SOAP 擴充功能。If you add information about the SOAP extension to the service description, a client can thus interpret that it must run the specific SOAP extension. 必須同時在用戶端和伺服器上執行的 SOAP 擴充功能例子，就是加密 SOAP 擴充功能。An example of a SOAP extension that must run on both the client and server is an encryption SOAP extension. 如果是加密 SOAP 擴充功能只能在伺服器上執行，而且它會傳回值加密其傳送回用戶端之前，用戶端必須執行才能解密 SOAP 訊息的 SOAP 擴充功能。If an encryption SOAP extension runs on only the server, and it encrypts return values before sending them back to the client, the client must have the SOAP extension running to decrypt the SOAP message. 否則，用戶端無法處理傳回的值。Otherwise, the client cannot process the return value. 使用下列步驟來建置服務描述格式延伸：Use the following steps to build a service description format extension: 1. 建立衍生自類別。Build a class that derives from . 2. 套用至類別，並指定其服務描述格式延伸應該能夠執行的擴充點。Apply a to the class and specify the extension points at which the service description format extension should run. 3. 選擇性地套用類別和指定的類別內的成員，做為新的擴充點。Optionally, apply a to the class and specify a member within the class to act as a new extension point. 4. 選擇性地套用至類別，並指定要與服務描述格式延伸模組所產生的 XML 項目關聯的 XML 命名空間前置詞。Optionally, apply a to the class and specify the XML namespace prefix to be associated with XML elements generated by the service description format extension. 5. 設定服務描述格式延伸模組內執行`serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes`組態檔區段。Configure the service description format extension to run within the `serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes` section of the configuration file. ## Examples [!code-csharp[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowElements { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出實作 屬性中指定之服務描述格式延伸的類別成員，是否可以接受未經處理的 XML 項目。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the member of the class that implements the service description format extension specified in the property can accept raw XML elements.

value.span: 如果實作 屬性中指定之服務描述格式延伸的類別成員可以接受未經處理的 XML 項目，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the member of the class that implements the service description format extension specified in the property can accept raw XML elements; otherwise, .
